original_title: Dealing: Or the Berkeley-to-Boston Forty-Brick Lost-Bag Blues
overview: A Harvard graduate transports a load of marijuana from Boston to Berkeley, California.
tagline: Peter and Susan. Harvard and Berkeley. Rock and grass. And then suddenly stake-outs and the "mob" and bullets. Real bullets!
title: Dealing: Or the Berkeley-to-Boston Forty-Brick Lost-Bag Blues
